summary: The legend of Siegfried and Brunhild, loosely based on characters from the Norse sagas and the pre-Christian Germanic heroic motifs outlined in the Nibelungensaga.
cast: Benno Fürmann|Kristanna Loken|Alicia Witt|Julian Sands|Samuel West|Max von Sydow|Robert Pattinson|Mavie Hörbiger|Aletta Bezuidenhout|Sean Higgs|Götz Otto|Ralf Moeller|Tamsin MacCarthy|Leonard Moss|Ryan Slabbert|Richard Farmer|Dean Slater|Richard Thomson|Anton Moon|Claire Berlein|Iain Bruce|Guy de Lancey|Bart Fouche|Jonathan Hearns|Dan Hirst|Peter Krummeck|Johan Malherbe|Jeremy Phillips|Jonathan Pienaar|Grant Swanby
title: El reino del anillo
